Wracky doll
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): Monster Types: Wracky: Wracky doll
By Alabia Niton on Saturday, December 9, 2000 - 05:03 pm:

can i get another wracky doll?the first one dissappeared or something.im bored.where did i put my crayons?

By Nate Railsback on Sunday, December 10, 2000 - 02:07 pm:

It doesn't matter how many times you throw out the Wracky Doll, it will just keep coming back. You need to have a monster die on your ranch before Wracky will be unlocked, though. There are two explanations: either your dead monster's spirit inhabits the doll, or else the doll killed your monster and is now prancing around about it.
